Text: FW NYISO Common Market Announcementthomas PST Paul As off the end of this month I will not be able to forward any incorrectly addressed mail This will be dure to me no longer having Lotus notes or beining on the ENRON servers PT Forwarded by Paul ThomasEUEnron on From Juan nronXgate on CST To William nronxgate Mark Dana nronXgate Paul nron Peter nronXgate Bryce nronXgate cc Subject FW NYISO Common Market Announcement fyi new york nepool agreement to form northeast rto Original Message From ENRON Sent Tuesday January AM To Padron Juan Subject NYISO Common Market Announcement Dear Market Participants Attached are a press release announcing an agreement between NYISO and ISONE to form a common market and a copy of the signed agreement If you have questions about this announcement please call your Customer Relations representative or the Customer Relations Help Desk at See attached file NYNECommon MarketdocSee attached file nyisoneagreementpdf Regards Customer Relations NYNECommon Marketdoc nyisoneagreementpdf You are currently subscribed to nyisotie as To unsubscribe send a blank email to

FW PJM Forwarded by Paul ThomasEUEnron on From Teresa nronXgate on CDT To Robert nronXgate Joe nronXgate Robert nronXgate Gautam nronXgate Paul nron cc Subject FW PJM Guys Bob ask if I could help coordinate a meeting with you to gather valuable input Would Tuesday or Wednesday afternoon around be an acceptable time If so well be happy to step up and visit with you Thanks so much T Original Message From Shults Bob Sent Monday September AM To Mandola Teresa Subject PJM Teresa I was talking to True Quote while in New Orleans and Chris indicated that a northeast RTO was looking at potentially buying there real time system I am not sure why they would be looking at the system but suspect that they could use it as a means of communicating with the individual asset owners Maybe they would use it to display capacity and prices from the asset owners My desire to talk to the desk is to see if they can help me get a better idea of what the RTOs will be doing and to see if they had any ideas on how to structure a deal for the RTOs PJM seems to be a front runner in developing solutions for RTOs and has in fact created a company called PJM Tech Apparently they came to talk to us in the past I have a good contact at PJM but what to clear a meeting with the desk first Bob Shults EnronOnline LLC Houston Texas cell

Re Tracking Actual Physical Power Transactions using TradersNews Energy Hourly Indexes Cc PST Good morning Houston This is England calling please be aware that there are two Paul Thomass one in Houston is Paul D Thomas and one in UK me Good luke for the future PT Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Jennifer Prewit Please respond to Jennifer Prewit To UndisclosedRecipientlittleblueipgdirectcom cc Subject Tracking Actual Physical Power Transactions using TradersNews Energy Hourly Indexes Original Message From Jennifer Prewit To Miles Weigel Sent Friday January AM Subject HURRAY looks great on my endhow bout yours links work IMAGE IMAGEIMAGE IMAGE hexjpg hexjpg hexjpg hexjpg

FW Tuition Reimbursementthomas PST Hi Paul Your still alive and kicking out there in the USA I see thats great Keep the side up Regards Paul UK Forwarded by Paul ThomasEUEnron on From Anne nronxgate on CST To Peter nronXgate Paul nron cc Subject FW Tuition Reimbursement Just as an FYI for you both you will receive your tuition reimbursement on your check If you have any questions please dont hesitate to contact me Thanks Anne Original Message From Parra Veronica Sent Wednesday January AM To Labbe Anne Cc Slone Jeanie Alvarez Irma Subject RE Tuition Reimbursement Anne Irma did give me the forms last week Both Peter and Paul will see their tuition on check Veronica Parra Ext Original Message From Labbe Anne Sent Monday January PM To Parra Veronica Cc Slone Jeanie Alvarez Irma Subject Tuition Reimbursement Veronica I gave those to Irma just before we left for Christmas They did not have your stamp on them as Ben had not turned them into you yet Irma said however that they could still be processed Original Message From Slone Jeanie Sent Monday January PM To Labbe Anne Subject FW we turned in those forms you found lurking in Bens desk didnt we i think so Original Message From HR Service Connection Sent Thursday December PM To Slone Jeanie Subject RE Jeanie We currently do not have tuition for both Paul and Peter I did not notice that they are in the AssAna grp You might want to check w Terry Bosien as her team had this process separate from us at one point Veronica Parra Ext Original Message From Slone Jeanie Sent Wednesday December AM To HR Service Connection Subject Paul Thomas and Peter Makkai submitted tuition reimbursement forms to Kim Melodick prior to bankruptcy approx Nov I can not track down the actual paperwork and wanted to make sure that this was being processed Please confirm
Re you dont need access to stack manager Cc PST Please direct this mail to the correct recpient Paul D ThomasNAEnron

VEPCO Forwarded by Paul ThomasEUEnron on From Rahil nronXgate on CST To Elizabeth nronXgate Kevin M nronXgate cc Harlan nronXgate Heather nronXgate Laura nronXgate Paul nron Subject VEPCO Kevin and Elizabeth Attached is a proposal summarizing our restructuring talks with VEPCO last week We had proposed to them what Kevin had suggested and they said their view on pricing in Virginia is slightly different at a discount to PJMVAP as against a premium suggested by us Theyd requested we send them some discussion points from our meeting today so we can continue our discussions on an ongoing basis Please review the bulletpoint summary of our discussions last week and the draft proposal We would appreciate your quick comments but keep in mind this is just to stimulate further discussions with them Our overall objective is to migrate them to a new contract and away from their rights to audit the last few years Discussion summary Both parties agree that the contract needs to be revised to reflect current market conditions pricing liquidated damages etc Enron would retain flexibility around the physical delivery points VEPCO would like to continue treating this as a call option versus a firm delivery Settlement Would prefer the DayAhead index versus the hourly index Could also look at another PJM West index VAPAlleghany Will look at alternate times for calling on power if necessary Would like to renegotiate by Rahil

Re Fw Altomonte Italy RFQ Zero Discharge Water Control Associates Forwarded by Paul D ThomasNAEnron on AM Enron Europe From Tony Thompson AM To Paul D nron David nron David nron cc Subject Re Fw Altomonte Italy RFQ Zero Discharge Water Control Associates FYI Forwarded by Tony ThompsonEUEnron on Andy Pottage To John CT Tony nron cc Steven nron Subject Re Fw Altomonte Italy RFQ Zero Discharge Water Control Associates FYI Forwarded by Andy PottageEUEnron on Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From alan armour To cc Gus Stasche Subject Re Fw Altomonte Italy RFQ Zero Discharge Water Control Associates Andy Water Control Associates WCA will give you this Friday a Firm price for the complete Design and required Bill of Materials for the Zero Discharge Equipment along with estimated equipment budget costs They will try and come up with Firm Equipment pricing the following Friday The proposal will be submitted by Gus Stasche at WCA and his Email is Regards Alan Armour Original Message From To alan armour Cc Sent Tuesday May AM Subject Re Fw Altomonte Italy RFQ Zero Discharge Water Control Associates Alan Can you provide a budget proposal by close of business Friday May and follow up with fixed price proposal by Friday May Regards Andy Pottage Purchasing Manager NEPCO Europe Limited Embedded Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp image moved to file From alan armour picpcx To cc Subject Fw Altomonte Italy RFQ Zero Discharge Water Control Associates Andy Oops missed an n in Enron trust you receive this okay Alan Armour Original Message From alan armour To Cc Gus Stasche Sent Monday May AM Subject Altomonte Italy RFQ Zero Discharge Water Control Associates Andy We have received an RFQ for the subject Plant As mentioned to Alice this morning it would not be possible to come up with firm numbers for the system by Friday Do you need firm proposal or budget pricing Further Water Control Associates WCA would offer an alternate side stream system to that specified It would not make sense to supply tanks piping etc from US sources for a project in Italy What Water Control Associates could do is create the design and specify the equipment required to be primarily sourced in Europe For a cooling tower project in Chile for Kvaerner Vancouver we did just that where some equipment bought by Kvaerner came from USA and other materials locally in Chile WCA have a system operating in Turkey Please refer the web page wwwuswcacom Before we can go any further please reply Thank You Alan Armour Coast Turbo Inc Reps Pacific Northwest fax

Northeast PL DownloadDiana I would like to get together regarding the NYISO PL download there are few problem that I am encountering when running the download Let me know when you have a some time Paul

Morning ReportsRika I have had a request and I also think it is a good idea to put the regional gas price for the following regions PJM Transco Zone Non New York NY Transco Zone New York NEPOOL Algonquin The heat rates would then be calculated off the appropriate regional gas price Thanks Paul

PJM Announces CSS Training ProgramI think it would be a good idea to attend this training Let me know your schedules Paul Forwarded by Paul D ThomasNAEnron on AM From Narsimha Misra AM To Paul D nron cc Subject PJM Announces CSS Training Program get guys to one of these meetings Forwarded by Narsimha MisraNAEnron on liststhebiznet on Please respond to Sent by To cc Subject PJM Announces CSS Training Program writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List For those that thought CSS aka CIT was dead NYISO announcement May MOU Mtg Springfield Mass and C Kings E Mail rejoice It is alive and well See Below To Subject PJM Announces CSS Training Program Message sent from the pjmcustomerinfo mailing list at On June PJM will implement the Collaborative Scheduling System CSS a new scheduling tool designed to facilitate transaction schedules between New York and PJM CSS will become part of the EES tool now used to schedule transactions from and to PJM neighbors PJM will offer several twohour virtual workshops to introduce the new system Participants who now use EES and will use CSS are encouraged to attend one of these workshops The dates for the workshops are May at am June at pm or June at pm The workshops will be presented on the internet with audio teleconference A complete description of the new tool the training program and a registration form for the program are available on the PJM web site at trainingcsscsshtml Please DO NOT REPLY to this message If you have a question for PJM Customer Relations and Training please complete and submit this form contactquestionshtml To unsubscribe from this list send an email to containing only the following line in the body of the email unsubscribe pjmcustomerinfo

NYISO NOTICE of Changes to OASISMISCSS SystemsLets talk about this to see how it might affect us Paul Forwarded by Paul D ThomasNAEnron on AM From Narsimha Misra AM To Gautam CT Paul D nron Paul J CT Joe nron Benjamin CT Peter nron cc Subject NYISO NOTICE of Changes to OASISMISCSS Systems Forwarded by Narsimha MisraNAEnron on on To cc Subject NYISO NOTICE of Changes to OASISMISCSS Systems Dan DiDio Customer Relations Forwarded by Daniel DidioNYISO on PM Sent by To ownernyisotech ists cc thebiznet Subject NYISO NOTICE of Changes to OASISMISCSS Systems PM Please respond to marketrelations writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List Dear Market Participants The NYISO is pleased to inform you about the following enhancements to the MIS OASIS and BAS that will be implemented on May Changes will be made to the Market Information System MIS to make inhour curtailment prioritization of transactions more consistent with the BME scheduling process Specific changes will be made to the NERC ranked ordering the addition of message for ICAP recall the exclusion of Federal contracts from ICAP transactions recalled and the inclusion of exports from LBMP reference bus as ICAP transactions Also for a transaction with an external source the decremental dollar will no longer be calculated Please see Technical Bulletin for more information regarding transaction curtailments servicesdocumentstechbulletinsindexhtml Changes will also be made to the MIS to remove the bias from day ahead external transactions New data will be posted to the NYISO OASIS web site to enhance the presentation of real time data The elements being added to the web site include zonal real time minute load values and zonal forecast load values Consistent with a resolution passed by the Business Issues Committee BIC zones J K will be combined The Shared Activation of Reserves SAR package on the real time system will be enhanced to accommodate support for Hydro Quebec HQ wheelthrough transactions The NYISO Dayahead Price Responsive Load Program will be implemented in both the MIS and the Billing and Accounting BAS systems The Dayahead Price Responsive Load program offers NYISO Customers the ability to supply a bid to the MIS indicating the cost at which it will reduce its demand by a specified number of MWs The program will make use of the existing bidding and scheduling web pages and upload download templates However you must register for this program Contact your Customer Relations representative for details Documents containing instructions with more details will be issued soon Other changes to the Billing Accounting system BAS will incorporate changes to the Daily Advisory Statements that will provide additional columns of information on the Power Suppliers section of the advisory Also new CSV reports will be provided that give more detailed load information and static subzone definition More information will be provided soon about a software tool to filter this new data It will be provided for Market Participants whose automated data retrieval systems are not prepared to receive the revised Daily Advisory statement Change s SWHEWQLHZ KKIRWQLHE VLEEWQQGL RDEYWTLS DCUKWRGYU If you notice any NYISO systems behave other than intended after the scheduled implementation date please let us know immediately It will be helpful if you refer to this notice if you communicate with us about these changes Thank you Customer Relations phone

PJM Announces CSS Training Programthink it would be a good idea to attend this training Let me know your schedules Paul Forwarded by Paul D ThomasNAEnron on AM From Narsimha Misra AM To Paul D nron cc Subject PJM Announces CSS Training Program get guys to one of these meetings Forwarded by Narsimha MisraNAEnron on liststhebiznet on Please respond to Sent by To cc Subject PJM Announces CSS Training Program writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List For those that thought CSS aka CIT was dead NYISO announcement May MOU Mtg Springfield Mass and C Kings E Mail rejoice It is alive and well See Below To Subject PJM Announces CSS Training Program Message sent from the pjmcustomerinfo mailing list at On June PJM will implement the Collaborative Scheduling System CSS a new scheduling tool designed to facilitate transaction schedules between New York and PJM CSS will become part of the EES tool now used to schedule transactions from and to PJM neighbors PJM will offer several twohour virtual workshops to introduce the new system Participants who now use EES and will use CSS are encouraged to attend one of these workshops The dates for the workshops are May at am June at pm or June at pm The workshops will be presented on the internet with audio teleconference A complete description of the new tool the training program and a registration form for the program are available on the PJM web site at trainingcsscsshtml Please DO NOT REPLY to this message If you have a question for PJM Customer Relations and Training please complete and submit this form contactquestionshtml To unsubscribe from this list send an email to containing only the following line in the body of the email unsubscribe pjmcustomerinfo
